name: Connect IQ data field sizes
tagline: Visualization of Connect iq data field sizes and possible use cases.
body:
### Visualization of Connect IQ data fields on Edge devices
This is the missing manual for Connect IQ data field sizes on Garmin Edge devices and use cases you need to consider.

###Garmin Edge 520
![](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/mkpaa/connect-iq-datafied-sizes/master/images/Edge-520.png)
* 1 Data field  
![](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/mkpaa/connect-iq-datafied-sizes/master/images/Edge520-1.png)
* 2 Data field

* 4 Data field  
![](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/mkpaa/connect-iq-datafied-sizes/master/images/Edge520-4.png)

![](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/mkpaa/connect-iq-datafied-sizes/master/images/Edge520-5.png)
* 6 Data field  
![](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/mkpaa/connect-iq-datafied-sizes/master/images/Edge520-6.png)

* 10 Data field  
![](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/mkpaa/connect-iq-datafied-sizes/master/images/Edge520-10.png)
